This method dynamically registers the supplied
subclass with the Audio Component system, in the context of the current process only. After you’ve registered the subclass, instantiate it by calling one of the following:

abstract.text: Record or play audio, convert formats, parse audio streams, and configure your audio session.

A subclass of the audio node class that, processes audio either in real time or nonreal time, depending on the type of the audio unit.

The protocol to which all class types implicitly conform.
